alert.note: Alert for Orange; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN ORANGE AND WEST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 859 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montgomery, or near Goshen, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, Monroe, Walden, West Point, Goshen, Cold Spring, New Windsor, Chester, Montgomery, Harriman, Kiryas Joel, Woodbury, Orange Lake, Washingtonville, and Firthcliffe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern New York.
